alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 1:53AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Webb County through 230 AM CDT... At 153 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ranchos Penitas West, or 11 miles northwest of Laredo, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Ranchos Penitas West, Orvil, Botines, Unitec Industrial Park and Doctors Hospital Of Laredo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 7 and 25. US Highway 83 between mile markers 692 and 698. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
